Title: Student and Staff Computing Devices **SOURCING #168884**
Required Documentation: Each submission must include a d
Product Categories: laptops, desktops, tablet devices, and display monitors
Bid Objective Summary: This Request for Proposal (RFP) will be for student and staff computing devices, including laptops, desktops, tablet devices, and display monitors. Vendors participating in this Request for Proposal (RFP) may submit proposals for one, several, or all categories of devices required by the District.
Technical Specifications: The specifications listed in this RFP are the minimum hardware requirements for each tier of device required by Dallas ISD. Vendors responding to this RFP must have the ability to provide the District with significant quantities of devices as requested in the pricing lines in this RFP.
